useCase.name: Deleting a photo
useCase.description: Admin deletes a photo from the system.

preconditions.precondition: Admin is logged in and has permissions to delete a photo.
Photo to be deleted exists in the system.

successEndConditions.condition: Photo successfully deleted from the system.

useCase.trigger: User wants to delete a photo from the system.

mainSequence.step: Frontend receives the request to delete a photo.
Backend processes the request to delete the photo.
Database confirms successful deletion of the photo.
Backend informs Frontend of successful deletion.
Frontend informs Admin that the photo was deleted successfully.
